taxonomicnotes: Geetakumari and Vishwanath (2010) described Badis dibruensis from Dibru River, Brahmaputra drainage, Assam.
rationale: As there is no information at present on the abundance and population of Badis dibruensis, it is assessed as Data Deficient. Further information is required on the species distribution, population, ecology and threats.
evaluator: Jha, B.R., Allen, D.J., Datta, N.C. & Britz, R.
